channel.title: Special attack won't work [pi]
channel.description:
Ok, one some of the npcs works Special, like bandos etc.. But all other wont work.. [27-11-10 16:33]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 407 [27-11-10 16:33]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial( CombatAssistant.java:1847) [27-11-10 16:33]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combat Assistant.java:151) [27-11-10 16:33]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:677) [27-11-10 16:33]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:136) [27-11-10 16:33]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:152)
Each time someone use special, i get this message. How do i fix, so special works? On players works btw..
